features: Made of 76% organic cotton/24% hemp plain weave with an anti-pilling finish for an airy feel and hang-to-dry performance
Made of 76% organic cotton/24% hemp plain weave with an anti-pilling finish for an airy feel and hang-to-dry performance
Sits on the waist with a regular rise; relaxed fit in the hips, seat and thighs, then cut straight to the ankle
Classic flat-front chino styling includes a low-profile button closure, a zip fly and double-needle belt loops for durability
Two slanted, side-entry front pockets and two welted, drop-in back pockets
Body: 4.5-oz 76% organic cotton/24% hemp plain weave with an anti-pilling finish. Pocket lining: 3.8-oz 65% recycled polyester/35% organic cotton twill. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
